entries.name: declare(test, repository)
entries.desc: Executes a SpecFetcher setup block.  Yields an instance then creates the gems and specifications defined in the instance.

entries.name: created_specs()
entries.desc: Returns a Hash of created Specification full names and the corresponding Specification.

entries.name: download(name, version, dependencies = nil, &block)
entries.desc: Creates a gem with name, version and deps.  The created gem is downloaded in to the cache directory but is not installed

entries.name: gem(name, version, dependencies = nil, &block)
entries.desc: Creates a gem with name, version and deps.  The created gem can be downloaded and installed.

entries.name: legacy_platform()
entries.desc: Creates a legacy platform spec with the name 'pl' and version 1

entries.name: spec(name, version, dependencies = nil, &block)
entries.desc: Creates a spec with name, version and deps.  The created gem can be downloaded and installed.
